abilities.description: Your vessel is fitted fore and aft with powerful cannons. When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.ae5994ceb3cba098]{Strike} at a pursuing or fleeing target, take +1 momentum on a strong hit.

Once per fight, when you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.3f5a834fa3fea5d1]{Gain Ground} by firing your chase guns to find the range of your target, add +1. On a strong hit, add +1 if you immediately @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.ae5994ceb3cba098]{Strike}, and continue to add +1 on each subsequent @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.ae5994ceb3cba098]{Strike} as long as you remain in control. If you score a strong hit with a match when using this ability, you damage a vital component; mark progress.

When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.23ebe48d2b1a1d58]{Face Defeat} in a fight and set a new objective to escape, you may (one time only) immediately @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.723192c97fec4fe2]{Clash} by firing your chase guns as you maneuver away from your foe; if you do, reroll any dice. On a strong hit, take +2 momentum.
